title: (x) Looking for fonts with traffic symbols - various {gang}
content:
hi I wonder if you can suggest me some fonts like FF traffic or some similiar symbols fonts?   
thank you in advance

 [‹ (x) Cincuo - Gertsner Original {Leroy}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10359 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Hank Williams log typeface - various {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10357 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mariano

comments.content:
I cannot find anything called 'FF traffic'. Do you mean [FF Transit Pict](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FF.11005.0.0)?   
   
If you are looking for 'free' dingbats, try [DaFont 'Various' Dingbats](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=721).

Do you mean [Interstate Pi?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/interstate-pi/)   
   
Or look at [Communication](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/communication-sb/)   
   
or this series, also confusingly called [Communications](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories=1&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=communications)

If you are also lookin' for general ' [Symbol signs](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.aiga.org/content.cfm?ContentAlias=symbolsigns)', AIGA may provide a nice resource.:   
_\> [www.aiga.org/content.cfm?ContentAlias=symbolsigns](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615180959/http:/www.aiga.org/content.cfm?ContentAlias=symbolsigns)_
thank you all for replying me so fast. yes I was looking for general traffic symbols, sorry maybe I haven
